<data.STAFFITEM.basic>

Items in all repertoires that may be printed near a staff.
Module
MEI

    dirDirectives.
    dynamDynamics.
    harmHarmony indications.
    ornamOrnaments.
    spSpoken text.
    stageDirStage directions.
    tempoTempo markings.
